BB Cannot wait to see what this was purchased for Via Licensing Corporation announces nearly 100 patents essential to the Long Term Evolution LTE standard have been purchased by Vias wholly owned defensive patent bank Invented by Blackberry some of the foundational technologies covered by these standard essential patents include advance packet networks carrier aggregation and network selection with coverage in 23 countries These patents were carefully selected from the best of the Blackberry SEPs in mid2018 due to their market relevance exceptional quality significant global coverage and essentiality to the LTE standard and beyond

BB Not many companies can say this Blackberry has been recognized by the Government of Canada as a benchmark for trusted technologyBlackBerry Government Mobility Suite which is a cloudbased endpoint management solution developed specifically for US government agencies has achieved Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program FedRAMP Ready status FedRAMP is a government program which requires cloud service provider CSP organizations to facilitate an independent thirdparty security assessment to determine if their product or service meets a series of security and controls management requirements to be eligible to host government data

BB Cylance is just one growth story QNX is currently demonstrating huge growth and we will coontinue to see more Remember nine of the top ten OEMs in the world are QNX customers Seven of the top eight car manufacturers are QNX customers Currently at minimum 120 million cars in the world using BlackBerry QNX technology As I recall from an article I read QNX ships in an automotive system every 25 secondsBoth Nvidia and Baidu selected QNX for at least three reasons most secure OS has the mobile communication technologies already built in plus scalability as QNX can run on the smallest of devices or on chips
